.. autoapisummary::

   datascience.src.utils.ers.NS


.. data:: NS
   

   

.. function:: remove_namespace(tag: str)

   Removes xmlns from tag string.

   --------
   Examples

   >>> remove_namespace("{http://ec.europa.eu/fisheries/schema/ers/v3}OPS")
   "OPS"


.. function:: xml_tag_structure_func_factory(max_depth, max_nb_children)


.. function:: has_tag(tag)


.. function:: get_elements_by_ers_tag(xml_element, ers_tag)


.. function:: get_root_tag(xml_element)


.. function:: get_first_child(xml_element, assert_child_single=True)


.. function:: make_datetime(date: str, time: Union[str, None] = None)

   Takes date a "2020-12-24" string and, optionnally, a time "16:49" string,
   Returns a datetime object
